edu.psu.seersuite.extractors.tableextractor
Class Debug

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.seersuite.extractors.tableextractor.Debug

public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object

This class is designed for testing purpose. The function is to validate the performance of the PDF text extractors. The combineLines results will be printed into files in middleResults_new directory. To call this class, the parameter "DEBUG_MODE" in "Config.java" should be set as "true".

Author:
Ying, Shuyi

Method Detail

printMiddleResults

public static void printMiddleResults(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<TextPiece>> wordsByPage,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<TextPiece>> linesByPage,
                                      java.lang.String outputDirPath,
                                      java.io.File pdfFile)
For testing purpose. The function of this method is to display the middle-stage text combination results. E.g., combined texts in the Word or Line level. The results will be printed into files "pdfFile" in path "outputDirPath" in the directory of the PDF documents

Parameters:
wordsByPage - the word list of a PDF document page
linesByPage - the line list of a PDF document page
outputDirPath - the directory path where the middle-stage results will go to
pdfFile - the PDF file being processed
Throws:
java.io.IOException

printTableMeta

public static void printTableMeta(java.lang.String outputDirPath,
                                  java.io.File pdfFile,
                                  java.lang.String meta)
After detecting and extracting a table, this method enables us to save the table metadata file locally for later performance evaluation.

Parameters:
outputDirPath - the directory path where the middle-stage results will go to
pdfFile - the PDF file being processed
meta - the table metadata to be printed
Throws:
java.io.IOException

printStatInfo

public static void printStatInfo(java.lang.String outputDirPath,
                                 java.io.File pdfFile,
                                 int pageNum,
                                 int tableNum)
After processing all the PDF documents, this method helps us to get the statistic information of all the PDF documents such as the total number of pages, tables, etc.

Parameters:
outputDirPath - the directory path where the middle-stage results will go to
pdfFile - the PDF file being processed
pageNum - the total number of pages in the PDF directory
tableNum - the total number of detected tables in the PDF directory
Throws:
java.io.IOException
